mapper.select: SELECT ano, email, name, cname, type, imgUrl, memo, amount, isExcept FROM account WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (email, name, cname, type, imgUrl, memo, amount) VALUES (#{email}, #{request.name}, #{request.cname}, #{request.type}, #{request.imgUrl}, #{request.memo}, #{request.amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET type = #{request.type}, name = #{request.name}, cname = #{request.cname}, amount = #{request.amount}, memo = #{request.memo}, imgUrl = #{request.imgUrl} WHERE ano = #{accountId}
